citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40pm on 29-SEP-
22.
The inspector arrived at the facility during the optimal hours provided by the registrant. The registrant was contacted via
phone twice and a voicemail was left both times. The registrant contacted the inspector by email to say that he would be
unavailable for inspection for the rest of the evening.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40pm on 29-SEP-
22. 
 
The inspector arrived at the facility during the optimal hours provided by the registrant. The registrant was contacted via 
phone twice and a voicemail was left both times. The registrant contacted the inspector by email to say that he would be 
unavailable for inspection for the rest of the evening. 
 
 
 
End Section
